ACCOUNT_BOOK_TRANSFER_MODAL.CONTENT: Transferring a ledger will move all its associated data, including company details and financial records, to another team. Ensure that the recipient team is authorized and capable of managing the transferred ledger before initiating the process.

TRANSFER.TO_TEAM: Transfer request for account book "{{accountBookName}}" was initiated by {{fromTeamName}}, pending your team's action

APPROVED.FROM_TEAM: Account book "{{accountBookName}}" has been successfully transferred to {{toTeamName}}
APPROVED.TO_TEAM: Account book "{{accountBookName}}" has been successfully received by your team

CANCELLED.FROM_TEAM: Transfer request for account book "{{accountBookName}}" has been cancelled
CANCELLED.TO_TEAM: Transfer request for account book "{{accountBookName}}" was cancelled by {{fromTeamName}}

REJECTED.FROM_TEAM: Transfer request for account book "{{accountBookName}}" was rejected
REJECTED.TO_TEAM: Your team has rejected the transfer request for account book "{{accountBookName}}"
